verses.verse: And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Why hast <S%H4100>thou<s%> <S%H6213>served<s%> us <S%H1697>thus<s%>, that thou <S%H7121>calledst<s%> us not, when thou <S%H1980>wentest<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H4080>Midianites<s%>? And they did <S%H7378>chide<s%> with him <S%H2394>sharply<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, What have I <S%H6213>done<s%> now in comparison of you? Is not the <S%H5955>gleaning<s%> of the grapes of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H1210>vintage<s%> of <S%H44>Abi-ezer<s%>?

<S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into your <S%H3027>hands<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H6159>Oreb<s%> and <S%H2062>Zeeb<s%>: and what was I <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> in comparison of you? Then their <S%H7307>anger<s%> was <S%H7503>abated<s%> toward him, when he had <S%H1697>said<s%> <S%H1696>that<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and passed <S%H5674>over<s%>, he, and the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that were with him, <S%H5889>faint<s%>, yet <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> them.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, <S%H5414>Give<s%>, I pray you, <S%H3603>loaves<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> unto the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H7272>follow<s%> me; for they be <S%H5889>faint<s%>, and I am <S%H7291>pursuing<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Are the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> now in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> unto thine <S%H6635>army<s%>?

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Therefore when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> into mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, then I will <S%H1758>tear<s%> your <S%H1320>flesh<s%> with the <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and with <S%H1303>briers<s%>.

¶ And he went <S%H5927>up<s%> thence to <S%H6439>Penuel<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto them <S%H2063>likewise<s%>: and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> him as the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%> had <S%H6030>answered<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>spake<s%> also unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, When I come <S%H7725>again<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>, I will break <S%H5422>down<s%> this <S%H4026>tower<s%>.

¶ Now <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> were in <S%H7174>Karkor<s%>, and their <S%H4264>hosts<s%> with them, about <S%H2568%H6240>fifteen<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> men, all that were <S%H3498>left<s%> of all the <S%H4264>hosts<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6924>east<s%>: for there <S%H5307>fell<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H8025>drew<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of them that <S%H7931>dwelt<s%> in <S%H168>tents<s%> on the <S%H6924>east<s%> of <S%H5025>Nobah<s%> and <S%H3011>Jogbehah<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%>: for the <S%H4264>host<s%> was <S%H983>secure<s%>.

And when <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%>, he <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, and <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, and <S%H2729>discomfited<s%> all the <S%H4264>host<s%>.
¶ And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> from <S%H4421>battle<s%> <S%H4608>before<s%> the <S%H2775>sun<s%> was up,

And <S%H3920>caught<s%> a young <S%H5288>man<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of him: and he <S%H3789>described<s%> unto him the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> thereof, even threescore and <S%H7657%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>.

And he <S%H935>came<s%> unto the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, with whom ye did <S%H2778>upbraid<s%> me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Are the <S%H3709>hands<s%> of <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> now in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that we should <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> unto thy <S%H582>men<s%> that are <S%H3287>weary<s%>?

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, and <S%H6975>thorns<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and <S%H1303>briers<s%>, and with them he <S%H3045>taught<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5523>Succoth<s%>.
And he beat <S%H5422>down<s%> the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H6439>Penuel<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

¶ Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, <S%H375>What<s%> manner of <S%H582>men<s%> were they whom ye <S%H2026>slew<s%> at <S%H8396>Tabor<s%>? And they <S%H559>answered<s%>, As <S%H3644>thou<s%> art, so were they; each <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8389>resembled<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, They were my <S%H251>brethren<s%>, even the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%>: as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H2416>liveth<s%>, <S%H3863>if<s%> ye had saved them <S%H2421>alive<s%>, I would not <S%H2026>slay<s%> you.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3500>Jether<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>, <S%H6965>Up<s%>, and <S%H2026>slay<s%> them. But the <S%H5288>youth<s%> <S%H8025>drew<s%> not his <S%H2719>sword<s%>: for he <S%H3372>feared<s%>, because he was yet a <S%H5288>youth<s%>.

Then <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6965>Rise<s%> thou, and <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon us: for as the <S%H376>man<s%> is, so is his <S%H1369>strength<s%>. And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H2026>slew<s%> <S%H2078>Zebah<s%> and <S%H6759>Zalmunna<s%>, and took <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H7720>ornaments<s%> that were on their <S%H1581>camels'<s%> <S%H6677>necks<s%>.

¶ Then the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, <S%H4910>Rule<s%> thou over us, both thou, and thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>son's<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> also: for thou hast <S%H3467>delivered<s%> us from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, I will not <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you, neither shall my <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H4910>rule<s%> over you.

¶ And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, I would <S%H7592>desire<s%> a <S%H7596>request<s%> of you, that ye would <S%H5414>give<s%> me every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5141>earrings<s%> of his <S%H7998>prey<s%>. (For they had <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings<s%>, because they were <S%H3459>Ishmaelites<s%>.)

And they <S%H559>answered<s%>, We will <S%H5414>willingly<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> them. And they <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H8071>garment<s%>, and did <S%H7993>cast<s%> therein every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5141>earrings<s%> of his <S%H7998>prey<s%>.

And the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings<s%> that he <S%H7592>requested<s%> was a <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shekels of <S%H2091>gold<s%>; beside <S%H7720>ornaments<s%>, and <S%H5188>collars<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%> <S%H899>raiment<s%> that was on the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>, and beside the <S%H6060>chains<s%> that were about their <S%H1581>camels'<s%> <S%H6677>necks<s%>.

And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> an <S%H646>ephod<s%> thereof, and <S%H3322>put<s%> it in his <S%H5892>city<s%>, even in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%>: and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> went thither a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> it: which thing became a <S%H4170>snare<s%> unto <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, and to his <S%H1004>house<s%>.

¶ Thus was <S%H4080>Midian<s%> <S%H3665>subdued<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, so that they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H7218>heads<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%>. And the <S%H776>country<s%> was in <S%H8252>quietness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>.
¶ And <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in his own <S%H1004>house<s%>.
And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> had threescore and <S%H7657>ten<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of his <S%H3409>body<s%> <S%H3318>begotten<s%>: for he had <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>.
And his <S%H6370>concubine<s%> that was in <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>, she also <S%H3205>bare<s%> him a <S%H1121>son<s%>, whose <S%H8034>name<s%> he <S%H7760>called<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>.

¶ And <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in a <S%H2896>good<s%> old <S%H7872>age<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>, in <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%> of the <S%H33>Abi-ezrites<s%>.

And it came to pass, as soon as <S%H1439>Gideon<s%> was <S%H4191>dead<s%>, that the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> turned <S%H7725>again<s%>, and went a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1168>Baalim<s%>, and <S%H7760>made<s%> <S%H1170>Baal-berith<s%> their <S%H430>god<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> not the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, who had <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of all their <S%H341>enemies<s%> on every <S%H5439>side<s%>:

Neither <S%H6213>shewed<s%> they <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3378>Jerubbaal<s%>, namely, <S%H1439>Gideon<s%>, according to all the <S%H2896>goodness<s%> which he had <S%H6213>shewed<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
